text: FantasiaInformation on Fantasia is the eleventh (11th) studio album by Puerto Rican singer Yolandita Monge. It was the first release of the singer under her recording contract with the international label CBS Records, now Sony Music Latin. This album was released in 1980 and includes the radio hits "Tanto Amor", "Como Lo Hago Yo", and "Al Ritmo De la Fantasía". It was re-issued on CD format in 1992 and is currently out of print in all formats. Several hits songs appear in various compilations of the singer available as digital downloads at iTunes and Amazon. ==Track listing== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Track !! Title !!
